DatacloudPurchaseUsage.name: DatacloudPurchaseUsage
DatacloudPurchaseUsage.description: Represents an object used to identify and track Data.com record purchases. This object is available in API version 30.0 or later.

DatacloudEntityType.description: The type of Data.com record you want to purchase. 0—indicates contact entity type. 1—indicates company entity type.

Description.description: An optional field. You can add a description for your purchase.

Name.description: An optional field used to name your record.

PurchaseType.description: A read only field set by the API to identify the purchase type. Added Export API

Usage.description: A read only field set by the API. It is used to track the points used to purchase records.

UserId.description: A read only field set by the API that identifies the user purchasing the records.

UserType.description: A read only field set by the API with 2 user types. Monthly Usage List Pool User
